weka.dl4j.listener

Class EpochListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.optimize.api.BaseTrainingListener
      • weka.dl4j.listener.TrainingListener
        • weka.dl4j.listener.EpochListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, org.deeplearning4j.optimize.api.TrainingListener, weka.core.OptionHandler

    public class EpochListener
extends TrainingListener
    A listener that prints the model score every epoch. Inspired by ScoreIterationListener written by Adam Gibson.
    See Also:
